title: I Am Troubled That My Fiance Is a Villain - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Age Progression   Arranged Marriage   Assassins   Average-looking Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Childhood Love   Couple Growth   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Engagement   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Mob Protagonist   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Nobles   Otome Game   Politics   R-15   Reincarnated in a Game World   Schemes And Conspiracies
author: Sancha   散茶
description: Lizia reincarnated into a mob character of an otome game world. With memories of her past life, she’s decided to live a happy life and give back to her parents, but she ended up getting engaged to the Prince Route’s ultimate villain, Bernhardt. This is the struggle of Lizia as she somehow aims for a peaceful life.>
